name: High Tide Aviation
baseAirport: SUT -Cape Fear Regional Jetport/Howie Franklin Field
about: At High Tide Aviation, we are a premier flight school and aerial service provider based in Southport, NC, and St. Simons Island, GA. We offer comprehensive flight training programs for both airplanes and helicopters, including ground school, private pilot, instrument rating, and commercial pilot certifications. Our services also include scenic air tours, aerial photography and videography, and special event flights. With a strong commitment to safety and operational excellence, our experienced pilots and maintenance team ensure every flight meets the highest standards. We provide aircraft rentals, pilot services, and aircraft management, making us a one-stop solution for all your aviation needs. Join us for an unforgettable flying experience and to fulfill your dream of becoming a pilot.
